c-0: ^1: "Hello, sir. I am looking for the Alchemist. Have you seen him around?"

alchemist_location: ^0: "Hmm... I haven't seen him since this morning."

c-0: ^0: "He mentioned going to Orn Island for some research. You might want to check there."
^1: "Thank you for your help. I’ll head to the Fish Store to take the boat to Orn Island."
